wikipedia_page.main: General William Neville Custance  (26 October 1811 – 7 February 1886)  was a senior British Army officer, who served initially as an infantry officer; but mainly as cavalry officer. Seeing service in the Crimean War and the Indian Rebellion of 1857 (also known as the Indian Mutiny).

link_mentions.page: List of British Army full generals

response: Admiral Sir Reginald Neville Custance,  (20 September 1847 – 30 August 1935) was a Royal Navy officer. He was the eldest son of General William Neville Custance CB.
